Original.Name: Dark Brotherhood - Red Cowl . Black Leather-1877-0-95-1746276909.7z

State.Author: Dragten
State.Description: Complete 4k retexture of Dark Brotherhood shrouded armor and hood in several color variants for both male and female versions.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood - Shrouded Armor retexture

Original.Name: BCE - Buy Enchantment and Spellmaking Altars Patch-2567-1-0-1747095347.rar

State.Author: C0N0R
State.Description: Battlehorn Castle Expanded enhances and redecorates the iconic stronghold, adding new storage options, visual improvements, and an evolving Daedric Shrine Tracker that responds to quest progress. Includes secret room upgrades, rebalanced clutter, and better display organization for a more immersive home.
State.Name: Battlehorn Castle Expanded

State.Author: WMDBloodHunter
State.Description: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered) is a complete overhaul of the Dark Brotherhood locations to give them a fresh new take.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered)

State.Author: Richard7666
State.Description: Adds additional stabling, horses and sheep to the cities of western Cyrodiil.
State.Name: Horses and Livestock

Original.Name: B. Mad Spell Pack - Compatible with Gamepass-4242-3-1752687570.7z

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Spell pack containing entirely unique spells with magic effects implemented via UE4SS/Lua.
State.Name: Mad Spell Pack - LUA Magic Effects - UE4SS

State.Author: tehtark
State.Description: This mod removes the ability to fast travel, encouraging exploration, discovery, and a deeper connection with the landscape of Cyrodiil.
State.Name: No Fast Travel Remastered

State.Author: Maddensterror02
State.Description: Enhances combat AI to introduce more engaging fights with more challenging foes by decreasing idle times and increasing dodge and attack chances.
State.Name: Responsive Combat AI

Original.Name: TES4R Civis Harrada Spiddal Plants Dart Traps Fix-5009-1-2a-1760199331.7z

State.Author: CivisRomanus
State.Description: Harrada and Spiddal plants will stop attacking you after you picked them. Dart Traps will fire only once.
State.Name: TES4R Civis Harrada Spiddal Plants Dart Traps Fix

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: OBSE64 plugin that enables achievements when using Console Commands, removes the no-achievement flag from saves that already have it, and removes the "Achievements will be disabled" message in the console.
State.Name: Baka Achievement Enabler

State.Author: xConfused
State.Description: This is an updated version (for the current OR 1.2) of the original mod by xConfused.
State.Name: Delete Spells - OBSE - ASI - Updated

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Get unique tomes of knowledge upon completing Master Training quests. They grant new active lesser powers, passive boosts to skills and extra buffs for flavor as long as you keep the tomes in the inventory. Friendly barter in 1.0.5!!!
State.Name: Notes on Mastery - Master training rewards

State.Author: The Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive collection of bug fixes for the remastered version of Oblivion.
State.Name: Unofficial Oblivion Remastered Patch - UORP

State.Author: miken1ke
State.Description: Changes the sprint to be quicker and more upright.
State.Name: Alternative Sprint

State.Author: Xouthpaw
State.Description: A recreated world map for Cyrodiil and the Shivering Isles focused on accuracy and style
State.Name: Cartographers Map of Oblivion

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Separated Shrouded Armor, new Black Hand Robes pieces, Capes, Shrouded Weapons, anti-vampire Scorching Bow. NBO support, more to come. WIP.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood Arsenal ReDone (WIP)

State.Author: Fuzzles
State.Description: Move the "All Items" and/or the "All" magic tab to the first position in their menus.
State.Name: FuzzUI - All Tabs First

State.Author: Grassfinch
State.Description: This mod replaces the Gold Coast’s dry grasslands with golden grasslands.It's not an exact replica of the Gold Coast from back then, but it's a remaster of the golden grasslands that matches the landscape of Oblivion Remastered.
State.Name: Gold Coast Remastered

State.Author: OMNICRON777
State.Description: New Battle Worn Iron Armor retexture ONLY pack that replaces the Male and Female armor set textures. (original game models)
State.Name: IRON ARMOR - BATTLEWORN RETEXTURE

State.Author: ShadowModder771
State.Description: Cleaned up Legion Armor
State.Name: Legion Restored

State.Author: Haphestia
State.Description: Allows loading new interior cells, and other stringtable and localization entries.
State.Name: MagicLoader 2

State.Author: FelGrohiik
State.Description: All input button icons in the game have been redesigned to match the modernized UI of the remastered version while preserving the original art style.
State.Name: Modern Inputs Icon

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: Miscellaneous fixes for assets on the Unreal Engine side of Oblivion Remastered.
State.Name: Oblivion Unreal Fixes

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 16  options to replace the Daedric melee weapons.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Daedric

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 24 replacers for the Dwarven melee weapons to make the look a bit more practical.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Dwarven

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: Remodels the Ebony weapons to look a bit more practical.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Ebony

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 10 reshapes for the Elven melee weapons that hopefully look a bit more practical.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Elven

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 12 options for replacing the Fine Steel melee weapons.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Fine Steel

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 12 remodels for the Iron melee weapons to help them look a bit more practical.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Iron

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: Reshapes the quivers to be a bit less bulky and a bit more practical looking.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Quivers

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: Replaces the Silver melee weapons with somewhat more practical designs.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Silver

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 9 options to replace the Steel melee weapons with somewhat more practical designs.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Steel

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 4 options to replace the Steel helm.
State.Name: Protective Headgear - Steel Closed Helmet

Original.Name: Simple Critical Hit Chance - Main FIle-3185-3-3-1747674694.7z

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: A Simple, Customizable Critical Hit System. Made upon request.
State.Name: Simple Critical Hit Chance - UE4SS

State.Author: Lazorr and SammiLucia
State.Description:
Get ready to explore Cyrodiil with the definitive total engine overhaul mod for improved performance, reduced stuttering, and vastly improved visuals!



Ultra Mod Manager (UMM) now available with Oblivion performance presets and more! U+ is highly configurable- settings ultimately dictate performance. Please read below!
State.Name: Ultra Plus for Oblivion- Performance and Visuals Remastered

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod makes the power attack and hit voice of female Beastfolk (Khajiit, Argonian, Orc) races younger and more feminine.
State.Name: Younger Female Voice - Beastfolk

State.Author: UE4SS-RE
State.Description:
UE4SS v3.0.1-394-g437a8ff with an optional runtime setup for Oblivion Remastered.

NOTE: this is a slimmed runtime version for END users!
State.Name: UE4SS for OblivionRemastered

State.Author: TheJaceWindu
State.Description: You can now donate 10 gold to a beggar, you receive a short-lived Gift of Charity adding +10 to the Mercantile skill.
State.Name: Beggars Blessing - A Gift for Generosity

State.Author: WMDBloodHunter
State.Description: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered) is a complete overhaul of the Dark Brotherhood locations to give them a fresh new take.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered)

State.Author: Kaboff
State.Description: Drinking Human Blood item is now feeding for vampires.
State.Name: Human Blood Feeding Vampire

State.Author: ACHILLES - lubronbrons - Dispensation
State.Description: This mod provides helpers for three of the so-called "wild goose chase" optional quests in Oblivion: The Collector, A Venerable Vintage, and the Daedric Quests.
State.Name: No More Wild Goose Chases (Helpers for Shadowbanish Wine - Ten Ancestors - Daedric Shrines)

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Enchants vanilla robes to provide new mage gameplay. Implements cut content. New scripts. New spells. Buffed magical artifacts. Buffed staves scripts. Robes to suit different playstyles. Robes use only upper body slot now. Use gloves and pants with them. And shoes.
State.Name: Robes Plus - Mage Arsenal

State.Author: CivisRomanus
State.Description: All Master Trainers will be set as Essential i.e. they can no longer be killed. Their corresponding training skills fixed to match the level of training.
State.Name: TES4R Civis Master Trainers Fix

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: OBSE64 plugin that fixes the classic PickRefByID (prid) command
State.Name: Baka Fix Pick Ref

State.Author: Baestus
State.Description:
This mod removes the capping of skills in the damage and magicka cost formula. 

Skills previously stopped scaling at 100, even if you were at 150!

Effects all skills modified by Luck, AKA everything but Speechcraft, Athletics, and Acrobatics. (These are already uncapped.)
State.Name: Oblivion Damage Formula And Magicka Cost Skills Scaling Uncapper (OBSE) OR (ASI)

State.Author: WinterElfeas
State.Description: Make movement speed analog for controller, and removes the gliding (works for keyboard also)
State.Name: Analog Controller Speed and remove Inertia - Gliding (UE4SS)

State.Author: AlexPreit and qIpdlp
State.Description: Actual variety for Staves in the game. Modders' resource as well.
State.Name: Diverse Staves

State.Author: Fuzzles
State.Description: Move the "All Items" and/or the "All" magic tab to the first position in their menus.
State.Name: FuzzUI - All Tabs First

Original.Name: Less Annoying Enemies Nearby Warnings - OBSE INI-811-1-0-1745672758.7z

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: You can now wait, sleep and fast travel while being a bit closer to enemies.
State.Name: Less Annoying Enemies Nearby Warnings

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 2 options to replace the town guard helmet.
State.Name: Protective Headwear - Guard

State.Author: TheTr3y
State.Description: FINALLY! A mod that allows you to ascend and descend while swimming using the Jump and Crouch buttons!
State.Name: Simply Swim Up

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod makes the power attack and hit voice of female players of human races younger and more feminine.
State.Name: Younger Female Voice - Humans

State.Author: Mixxa77
State.Description: Places map markers at all Player Homes, Divine Pilgrimage Wayshrines, Doomstones, Runestones, Ayleid Wells and the Shrine of Kynareth. They are not marked on your map by default, you will have to find them on your own, but after discovering one, you can now Fast-Travel there.
State.Name: Additional Map Markers

State.Author: Me Myself and I
State.Description:
Some personal minor edit i did for benirus manor in case somebody else maybe interested on it :D

i love this house so much but its kinda feels eeh to me it feels like Lorgren Never even left D:
State.Name: Benirus Minor Makeover

State.Author: molerats
State.Description: Various changes to Imperial Legion weaponry and clothing for better consistency and realism
State.Name: Immersive Imperial Legion

State.Author: TheUntoldMods
State.Description: A simple mod that distributes some different robes to all Mages Guild members. No more civilian-dressed guild members!
State.Name: Mages Wear Robes (Mages Guild Outfit Overhaul)

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Disables the ability to travel to city map markers at the start of the game. You'll need to discover them first like in Skyrim. Also covers Weynon Priory and Cloud Ruler Temple.
State.Name: No Starting Map Markers

State.Author: Gerald
State.Description: This mod adds ruins near Fort Sutch.
State.Name: Ruins of Sutch

State.Author: CivisRomanus
State.Description: Fix for Bear Season, The Sunken One, A Venerable Vintage and Go Fish quests. Read description.
State.Name: TES4R Civis SQ 06 07 08 09 Quests Fix

State.Author: Wolfmark
State.Description: An OBSE64 plugin that fixes the buggy HUD icons for current active effects.
State.Name: Active Effects HUD Icons Fix

State.Author: Baestus
State.Description:
This mod removes the capping of Attributes in the damage formula. 

Attributes previously stopped scaling at 100, even if you were at 150!
State.Name: Oblivion Damage Formula Attribute Scaling Uncapper (OBSE) OR (ASI)

State.Author: Arccharger
State.Description: Want your locks to look actually worn down and used?  this is for you!
State.Name: Another Lock Retexture

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Separated arena armor, Standalone Pit Armor, Arena Rank-related progression, NBO support for female Raiment, fixed skirt colors.
State.Name: Arena Armor Overhaul (WIP)

Original.Name: H.U.E - Vanilla Replacer - Bright - Whiter Sclera-108-1-0-4-1748642021.zip

State.Author: KOALYNHA
State.Description: This mod replaces all Vanilla eyes for all races. The textures are all handmade and focused on a lore friendly experience. ♥
State.Name: H.U.E - Handmade Unique Eyes

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Implements basic MCM-style menus.
State.Name: Mad Mod Config Menu - MCM-style Menus for Oblivion Remastered

State.Author: Wong4Sik1
State.Description: A super simple mod that will put the shield on the player's back rather than the arm.
State.Name: Wonger's Shield on Back

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Alchemy overhaul: Potions and poisons now restore or damage over time instead of instantly. Includes Health, Fatigue, Magicka, elemental damage, and buffs for drinks like Ale and Beer.
State.Name: Alchemy Overhaul

Original.Name: Better Cyrodiil Travel - Generic NPC name-1496-4-5-1747649359.zip

State.Author: Rune
State.Description: Simple mod that allows you to travel between the main city stables, mage guild halls and DLC homes for a small fee.
State.Name: Better Cyrodiil Travel

Original.Name: Delayed Knights of the Nine (Regular Version)-2144-1-0-0-1746367786.zip

State.Author: MerseyRockoff
State.Description: Delays the start of Knights of the Nine story expansion until player reaches level 10 or 20.
State.Name: Delayed Knights of the Nine

State.Author: molerats
State.Description: Various changes to Imperial Legion weaponry and clothing for better consistency and realism
State.Name: Immersive Imperial Legion

State.Author: Maegfaer
State.Description:
Changes XP gain for Magic skills to be based on actual Spell Cost, rather than Spell Base Cost. Finally stops Magic skill leveling from accelerating at higher levels!



Properly fixes what my other mod "Skill Leveling XP Curvature Increased" tried to do with band-aids!
State.Name: Magic Skill Leveling Fixed

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Removes the default starting spells from the player. No more unwanted fireballs or healing magic — perfect for thieves, archers, and other non-mage characters who prefer to stay unnoticed.
State.Name: No Starting Spells

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: A hub for small tweaks I've made to the game that aren't worthy of an individual mod page. At some point I may merge some of these into other mods or as part of a much larger overhaul.
State.Name: Sasquatch's Small Gameplay Tweaks

State.Author: SpiderAkira
State.Description: Gives thieves guild members hoods to wear during certain quests.
State.Name: Thieves Guild Hoods

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: OBSE64 plugin that turns Quick Saves into normal Saves
State.Name: Baka Quick Full Saves

State.Author: Spacedroner
State.Description: Light overhauls of some of the faction homes to make them more competitive with the vanilla houses. Currently includes Dareloth's House, Fort Farragut, Knights of the Thorn Lodge, Seridur's House, and White Stallion Lodge.
State.Name: Faction Home Improvements - Dareloth's House - Farragut - OVB - Stallion Lodge - Thorn Lodge

State.Author: xEpicBradx
State.Description: Loads ue4ss as an OBSE64 plugin (for use with MO2)
State.Name: OBSE64 ue4ss Loader

State.Author: powerofthree
State.Description: OBSE64 plugin that makes unread books glow.
State.Name: Unread Books Glow

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod makes all dangling signs in game swing more naturally.
State.Name: Dangle and Swing

State.Author: Kei BWV997
State.Description: Kei(BWV997)'s Two-Handed Animations Overhaul. Uploaded with permission.
State.Name: Kei Animations - Morihaus Might (Two-Handed Animation Overhaul)

State.Author: Maegfaer
State.Description: Different from all other Skill Leveling XP mods so far, this mod changes the leveling CURVE. Higher levels will level considerably slower than lower levels! Interactive graph included!
State.Name: Skill Leveling XP Curvature Increased

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod restores the original and unique sound of all containers in game, similar to the OG Oblivion.
State.Name: Unique Container Sound

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Alchemy overhaul: Potions and poisons now restore or damage over time instead of instantly. Includes Health, Fatigue, Magicka, elemental damage, and buffs for drinks like Ale and Beer.
State.Name: Alchemy Overhaul

State.Author: Arx Vallium
State.Description: Conjurers are replaced with cultists and their dungeons are now host to Mythic Dawn covens.
State.Name: Better Oblivion Crisis - Cultists Replace Conjurers - OBR

State.Author: qip
State.Description: 25%, 50% or 80% chance of getting a random disease when you sleep on any bedroll. Go find a bed you weirdo.
State.Name: Diseased Bedrolls

State.Author: Takarazuka
State.Description: An immersive and lore-friendly overhaul of Deepscorn Hollow. New upgrades, choose your bed, add Rowley as a merchant to your home, and more!
State.Name: Immersive Player Homes - Deepscorn Hollow

State.Author: LousyUsername
State.Description: Restores the original male beast voice to some Argonian and Khajiit NPCs for variety (plus M'aiq uses the new voice)
State.Name: Male Beast Voice Variety

State.Author: Hexaae
State.Description: Will increase traps effectiveness (player and NPCs) [b]increasing damage[/b] by a multiplier (i.e. traps will be deadlier at lower player levels), easy to configure.
State.Name: Not so deadly trap

State.Author: SBModding
State.Description: Some basic tweaks to make crime detection more sensible.
State.Name: SB More Sensible Crime Alarm and No Horse Responsibility Fix

State.Author: JaceWindu
State.Description: Adds the powerful Staff of Mannimarco. With a new mesh and awesome necromantic abilities!
State.Name: True Staff of Mannimarco

State.Author: Decode64
State.Description: Fixes an issue where your character can permanently glow when wearing enchanted clothing or armor.
State.Name: Fix Persistent Character Glow

State.Author: DeathWrench
State.Description: Replace RobinsonNew font with KingThings PetRock
State.Name: Original Font (Kingthings Petrock)

State.Author: firesyrup
State.Description: Speed stat no longer turns you into Sonic the Hedgehog. Slower running, but faster sprinting to compensate.
State.Name: Rebalanced Movement - Slower Run and Sprint

State.Author: Baba
State.Description: Changes the color of the Skingrad guard armor to match the townbanner colors more accurately.
State.Name: Skingrad Guard Armor Fix - Recolor

State.Author: SardonicStare
State.Description: Does what it says on the tin. Restores Aldos Othran's original voice acting so you can once again experience his lyrical genius while walking the streets of Cheydinhal!
State.Name: Aldos Othran Voice Acting Restored

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Implements the Bound Weapon Perks from Skyrim. You unlock them via leveling Conjuration.
State.Name: Bound Weapon Perks

State.Author: Arx Vallium
State.Description: Items, Spells and Leveled Lists that are exclusive to certain DLCs are now integrated into the overall gameworld in ways that are sensible and lore-friendly for a fuller experience.
State.Name: DLC Integration - OBR

State.Author: Gerald
State.Description: This mod improves a small graveyard near The Imperial City Waterfront.
State.Name: Improved Graveyard

State.Author: mistressmiaura
State.Description: Adds lush plant life, atmospheric detail and little lights to the IC Arboretum district, making it a green botanical garden to relax  or study herbalism in.
State.Name: Miaura's Arboretum Enchanted

State.Author: SardonicStare
State.Description: This mod replaces the phoned-in, unengaging, and apathetic "Remastered" Shivering Isles voice acting with the energetic and convincing performances of the original Shivering Isles.
State.Name: Shivering Isles Voice Acting Restored

Original.Name: Boons of the Doomstones - Freely Swap-2183-1-2-1747098927.zip

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Overhauls the doomstone greater powers to be more unique, powerful, and thematic with a kiss and a curse design philosophy.
State.Name: Twilight Gifts - Boons of the Doomstones

Original.Name: All in one - v2 (1.512.105.0) Address Library-4475-2-1752773891.zip

State.Author: meh321
State.Description: Contains a database to make OBSE DLL plugins version independent easily.
State.Name: Address Library for OBSE Plugins

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: OBSE64 plugin that fixes the classic ToggleCollision (tcl) command
State.Name: Baka Toggle Collision Fix

State.Author: Zebrina
State.Description: All your enchanted weapons will slowly recharge over time. You can adjust how fast they should recharge and if the recharge should be percentage or point based. Powered by OBSE.
State.Name: Passive Weapon Enchantment Recharging - Enchanted Weapons Recharge Over Time - OBSE

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Functioning backpacks! Now with new models!!!! Thanks, HugAMuffin!
State.Name: Backpacks of Cyrodiil

State.Author: slowpard
State.Description: Replaces the font used for journals and letters with a handwritten-style one, just like in the OG Oblivion.
State.Name: Handwritten Journals and Letters - Font Replacer

State.Author: Antrix
State.Description: Flexible notification management framework. Aimed at reducing spam, applying cooldowns, controlling message duration, and optionally suppressing messages, with support for grouped or multilingual presets.
State.Name: Notifications Watchdog

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod changes physical materials in game so that objects exhibit their proper qualities, such as SFX, VFX, and collision response.
State.Name: Physical Material Swapper (PMS)

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod makes loading screens more interesting.
State.Name: Remastered Loading Screens

State.Author: maddhattr
State.Description:
YOU ASKED FOR IT! YOU WANTED IT!



And now, it’s finally happening! The Bruma Mages Guild is rising from the ashes and fully restored.
State.Name: Bruma Mages Guild Restored

Original.Name: Dynamic AI Behavior Animals V4 - Final Update-2228-v4-1746802150.rar

State.Author: OzenRSI
State.Description: Prey and predators will now react to you differently based on if you sneak, run, are in combat, or have a weapon drawn.
State.Name: Dynamic AI Behavior - Animals

State.Author: ColdTyrant
State.Description: Five major factions overhauled with infinite radiant content in one convenient package. Adventure through Cyrodiil the fun way - forever.
State.Name: Infinitum - Compendium

Original.Name: Dunbarrow Cove Enchanted NO NPC changes version-4340-1-0-1749754317.zip

State.Author: mistressmiaura
State.Description: Turns the DLC's Dunbarrow Cove into a more piraty pirate hideout or thieves den, growing more luxurious with your wealth. Atmospheric detail, new furnishings, plantlife, ingredients and more interesting upgrades including spellmaking and enchanting.
State.Name: Miaura's Dunbarrow Cove Enchanted

State.Author: SpiderAkira
State.Description: Any NPC or creature can catch on fire from open flames.
State.Name: NPCs Catch Fire

State.Author: Kalinter
State.Description: A complete overhaul of player dialogue choices for the Shivering Isles DLC. Inspired by Realistic Player Dialogue Overhaul.
State.Name: Shivering Isles Player Dialogue Overhaul

State.Author: Hy60koshk
State.Description: I hate to see how NPCs with claymores just won't come within the striking distance. Now they can finally hit the player when the player stays still.
State.Name: Two-handed Weapons Reach and Damage Increased

State.Author: kpvw aka Water Face
State.Description: Replaces the lock level of a locked door or container with the name of the key if the player has the key in their inventory. Now as an OBSE64 plugin!
State.Name: Which Key OB64 - OBSE64 Plugin

State.Author: Prohagon
State.Description: Brings back Pelinal Whitestrake's classic color scheme from Oldblivion by changing the color of the gold trim, tabard and metal closer to what it used to be.
State.Name: Classic Divine Crusader

State.Author: Fuzzles
State.Description: I CRAVE DENSITY.
State.Name: FuzzUI - Interface Tweaks

Original.Name: Kei Animations - Pelinal Edge One-Handed Overhaul-4816-1-0-1752172458.zip

State.Author: Kei BWV997
State.Description: Kei(BWV997)'s One-Handed Animations Overhaul. Uploaded with permission.
State.Name: Kei Animations - Pelinals Edge (One-Handed Animation Overhaul)

State.Author: slowpard
State.Description: Rebinds Enter to Space (or E if you want) in most menus. Now humans can use the keyboard to navigate.
State.Name: Press Space To Confirm (Enter Rebind)

State.Author: Test001
State.Description: A small interior improvement for Arborwatch (the player's home in Chorrol) to better match its price. Added a lot of storage spaces, display cases, etc.
State.Name: Arborwatch interior renovation

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Screw the Mages Guild and buy your own Enchantment and Spellmaking altars for your home.
State.Name: Buy Enchantment and Spellmaking Altars - For Player Homes

Original.Name: Empower Necromancy with Black Soul Gems-1300-2-3-1746683869.7z

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Increase the damage dealt by Undead Summons through Black Soul Gems
State.Name: Empower Necromancy with Black Soul Gems

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: This enhances the exteriors of roadside inns, bringing them to life with dynamic and immersive details.
State.Name: Inns - Quaint addon

State.Author: mistressmiaura
State.Description: Makes the IC Elven Gardens a greener, flowering garden district. Added flora and details, ivy climbing on buildings, with little corners to explore and places to sit and think or have a drink while watching the passers by.
State.Name: Miaura's Elven Gardens Enchanted

State.Author: Maddensterror02
State.Description: Standalone expansion for ORWO, Featuring loads of new gameplay tweaks and new enemies.
State.Name: ORWO - Ghosts and Spirits

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: A simple, fast start to your adventure!
State.Name: Simple Fast Start

State.Author: Various Authors
State.Description: Reworks much of the dialogue in the game to be more responsive and give NPC's more life and personality.
State.Name: Ultimate Dialogue Overhaul

State.Author: powerofthree
State.Description: OBSE64 plugin that allows users to change game settings via configuration files. ESP not required.
State.Name: Game Settings Loader

Original.Name: Better Infoboxes (Outlined No Prompt Vanilla Font)-222-1-4-1-1746266304.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Replaces huge infoboxes with black backgrounds with outlined text easy to read.
State.Name: Better Infoboxes

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: A lightweight, highly compatible combat mod designed to prevent gameplay from becoming boring as players reach high levels.
State.Name: Engaging Combat - Oblivion

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Unseelium's Sufferthorn updated and made standalone
State.Name: Unseelium's Sufferthorn updated and standalone (4K)

Original.Name: Arena Armor Overhaul - Esp and syncmap-5060-1-0-1-1763198353.7z

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Separated arena armor, Standalone Pit Armor, Arena Rank-related progression, NBO support for female Raiment, fixed skirt colors.
State.Name: Arena Armor Overhaul (WIP)

State.Author: Test001
State.Description: Mod improves the interior of the player's home in Cheydinhal, adding display cases, altars for enchanting, and additional chests for storage. The storage area has been remodeled and the lighting has been tweaked a bit.
State.Name: Cheydinhal House interior improvement

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: This mod keeps the weapon that an NPC is using on their corpse when they die, instead of it getting dropped somewhere.
State.Name: Enemy's Weapon Stays on Corpse

Original.Name: Base version with no requirements no NPCs or trees-5001-1-0-1755348010.zip

State.Author: mistressmiaura
State.Description: Brings the Green to the Green Emperor Way and elegance to the Imperial Palace interior, with optional Elder Council NPCs.
State.Name: Miaura's IC Palace Enchanted -Greener Emperor Way

State.Author: Maddensterror02
State.Description: Oblivion Remastered Wilderness Overhaul (ORWO) is a mod with the sole focus of completely overhauling the wilderness of all of Cyrodiil. Experience all new creatures and current creatures like never before. Featuring multiple new enemies and mini-bosses to find across your travels throughout Cyrodiil.
State.Name: ORWO - Oblivion Remastered Wilderness Overhaul

State.Author: Eupraxia
State.Description: Provides Pelts, Hides, Meats and Ingredients to various creatures of Cyrodiil.
State.Name: Simple Hunting Overhaul

State.Author: Chrollo
State.Description: Alternative Main Menu replaces main menu with 9 dynamic scenes.
State.Name: Alternative Immersive Main Menu for Obliviion

State.Author: rootBrz
State.Description: Engine plugin to control enchantment charge behavior: disable, slow down, or speed up drain. Affects only combat charge cost, preserving enchanting table balance.
State.Name: Configurable Enchantment Charge Cost OBSE - ASI

State.Author: wyattbradleyson
State.Description: Enables you to reverse pickpocket items that have carry weight onto NPCs.
State.Name: Reverse Pickpocket Weighted Items

State.Author: Halk Hogan PL
State.Description: Modification improves Khajiits look and makes them more fluffy.
State.Name: HD Reworked Khajiits

State.Author: Dayng
State.Description: Removes the white outline that appears when hovering over items.
State.Name: Remove Item Outlines

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: A subtle reshade preset intended to correct the warm reddish and brown tones of the remaster to more closely match the vibrancy and color palette of the original game. Special attention was paid to make this preset as performance friendly as possible.
State.Name: A Painted World Remastered - Reshade Preset

State.Author: Gerald
State.Description: This mod adds more spectators to the Imperial City Arena.
State.Name: Arena Crowds

State.Author: Spifferino
State.Description: Climates Revised aims to enhanced the vanilla weather experience by redistributing weather chances across all existing regions, in addition to adding new weather chances to regions that didn't have them.
State.Name: Climates Revised

State.Author: OrgasmicSneeze
State.Description: Realistic and higher quality blood splatters
State.Name: Enhanced Blood Textures

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: A repository for various patches I make for the Unofficial Oblivion Remastered Patch (UORP).
State.Name: Michael's UORP Patch Hub

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: makes the location Pell's Gate more vividly and harmonious, adding a little farm and amenities
State.Name: Pell's Gate - Quaint addon

State.Author: ReformedDevil
State.Description: Unlocks the eating animation upon consuming food through vanilla hotkeys. Comes with optional support for Core Survival.
State.Name: Simple Player Eating Idle

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Adds unique effects to all of the premade elemental spells in the game, similar to the effects present in the elemental spells of Skyrim.
State.Name: Unique Elemental Spells

State.Author: Caites WinterElfeas
State.Description: Makes compass widget smaller. Places gauges vertically in the left corner.
State.Name: Better HUD

State.Author: Spifferino
State.Description: A simple and clean retexture of rocks, cliffs, and mountains. Replaces the most commonly seen rock textures.
State.Name: Cliffs of Cyrodiil

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Separated Shrouded Armor, new Black Hand Robes pieces, Capes, Shrouded Weapons, anti-vampire Scorching Bow. NBO support, more to come. WIP.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood Arsenal ReDone (WIP)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes ingredients, effects and filter lists in Alchemy Menu denser, yet more readable.
State.Name: FuzzUI Plus Alchemy

State.Author: molerats
State.Description: Adds a unique, standalone cuirass as a reward for becoming a member of the Knights of the White Stallion. Mazoga will receive one as well depending on the outcome of the quest
State.Name: Knights of the White Stallion Armor

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 5 options to replace the Daedric/Bound helmet.
State.Name: Protective Headgear - Daedric

State.Author: Ridog8
State.Description: Removes the beard from the female and/or male Khajiit race
State.Name: Remove Khajiit Beard

State.Author: whybeevee
State.Description: Increases arena rewards for title fights and Grand Champion fights. You can choose from x2, x4, x5, x8, x10, x20, and x100 versions.
State.Name: Arena Rewards Increased

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds ownership to all random clutter, containers, and crops in cities and settlements across Cyrodiil and the Shivering Isles.
State.Name: Complete Clutter and Crop Ownership

State.Author: PensivePen
State.Description: This mod adds directions for quests in the player's journal, allowing players who choose not to use map markers to find objectives without needing to wander aimlessly.
State.Name: Journal-Based Quest Directions

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: A repository for various patches I make for the Unofficial Oblivion Remastered Patch (UORP).
State.Name: Michael's UORP Patch Hub

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: This mod changes the effects of the Doomstones you can find out in the world from a once per day greater power to a lower but permanent bonus to attributes and skills. Just like in Skyrim.
State.Name: Permanent Doomstones

State.Author: Bhephel
State.Description:
all generic Conjurers drop spell tomes, like you would expect. Just a leveled list added to some NPC inventories. 

Now with vanilla balance Conjurers Drop Scrolls version!
State.Name: Spell Tomes Drop From Conjurers

State.Author: J3w3ls
State.Description:
Unlocks the arena so you can fight 24/7, even in the dead of night, as well as loot opponents and wear anything you like

Also fixes a vanilla bug where you always get "it's not the right time" to fight in the arena.
State.Name: Unlocked Arena

State.Author: rootBrz
State.Description: Engine plugin that lets you control items durability behavior. Disable it completely, slow it down, or make it degrade faster, without breaking XP gains.
State.Name: Configurable Item Degradation OBSE - ASI

State.Author: Fuse00
State.Description: New textures for eyebrows.
State.Name: Eyebrows Retexture

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Overhauls the vanilla Orrery effects into a smaller but constant buff rather than a once per day greater power.
State.Name: Constant Orrery Effects

State.Author: PensivePen
State.Description: This mod adds directions for quests in the player's journal, allowing players who choose not to use map markers to find objectives without needing to wander aimlessly.
State.Name: Journal-Based Quest Directions

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: A repository for various patches I make for the Unofficial Oblivion Remastered Patch (UORP).
State.Name: Michael's UORP Patch Hub

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: Adds more signposts and road signs to Cyrodiil.
State.Name: Quaint Roads - More Road Signs

State.Author: Rikiaz
State.Description: Makes the premade spells that restore health and fatigue do so over time, instead of instantly.
State.Name: Spells Restore Over Time

Original.Name: Unmarked Locations Pack - Imperial City Isle-2892-1-0-1746920202.rar

State.Author: Gerald
State.Description: This mod adds new unmarked locations to Imperial City Isle!
State.Name: Unmarked Locations Pack - Imperial City Isle

State.Author: shadeMe
State.Description: This OBSE64 plugin adds support for using editorIDs in the console, i.e., you may now use 'player.addItem lockPick 100' in the console.
State.Name: Runtime EditorIDs (Console)

State.Author: IRAPPIDZ
State.Description: Replaces vanilla armor sounds with cleaner, more modern assets.
State.Name: Armor Sound Overhaul

State.Author: Halk Hogan PL
State.Description: Improved textures of underwear for female and male + different color variants for women's underwear.
State.Name: High Quality Underwear and color options

State.Author: qip
State.Description:
Elf Stuff -> Better Elf Stuff

Now available in five colors!
State.Name: Pleasing Palettes - Everything Elven

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: An immersive vanilla plus balance mod. Rare loot is actually rare, high level enemies only spawn at boss-level spawn points, low level enemies and items can spawn regardless of level, and a ton of other minor balance tweaks. Oblivion, as it was meant to be!
State.Name: Ascension Remastered - Vanilla-Plus Loot and Balance

State.Author: rockmik
State.Description:
Core Survival brings a balanced, immersive survival mode to Oblivion, as if it were part of the vanilla game

(with COOKING and FISHING included).
State.Name: Core Survival (Needs - Cooking - Fishing)

State.Author: NaiadGirl
State.Description: Previously lacking Goblin Wars now have automatic triggers to happen without player involvement!
State.Name: Enhanced Goblin Wars

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: A repository for various patches I make for the Unofficial Oblivion Remastered Patch (UORP).
State.Name: Michael's UORP Patch Hub

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Overhauls all of the birthsigns with unique, vanilla friendly effects to improve viability, provide clear strengths and weaknesses, and change how you play the game.
State.Name: Star Signs - Birthsigns Reimagined

State.Author: The Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive collection of bug fixes for the remastered version of Oblivion.
State.Name: Unofficial Oblivion Remastered Patch - UORP

State.Author: Wolfmark
State.Description: An OBSE64 plugin for fixing an old bug still present in Remastered: in some cases not all items are listed when viewing the content of a container.
State.Name: Container and Inventory Menu Fix

State.Author: Moonling
State.Description: Reworks how the Security skill factors into the lockpicking minigame to be closer to the original game.
State.Name: Lockpicking Minigame Tweaks - OBSE - ASI

State.Author: Antrix
State.Description: Adds data for TesSyncMapInjector, which fixes the bug with incorrect display of information for ingredients added by SHO, as well as other related issues.
State.Name: Simple Hunting Overhaul - TesSyncMapInjector Patch

State.Author: slowpard
State.Description: HOW MUCH HAMMERS DO YOU WANT? DO YOU WANT TO SELL 2 YARN FOR 1 GOLD? ARE YOU SURE? Enough already. No more questions.
State.Name: Auto-Confirm Quantity and Barter Prompts

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: More colorful and clear icons for your map!
State.Name: Colorful Clear Map Icons

State.Author: Blackread
State.Description: A compendium of game setting tweaks using Game Settings Loader to save on those precious plugin slots. A fully modular FOMOD package with a wide range of options for ease of installation.
State.Name: Game Setting Compendium

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod fills goblets and mugs in Cyrodiil with a variety of drinks so that people can quench their thirst.
State.Name: Obey Your Thirst

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 5 options to replace the Ebony helmet
State.Name: Protective Headgear - Ebony Closed Helmet

State.Author: AlexPreit
State.Description: Replacers the mesh for basic robe with a new, revealing one. Compatible with retextures. Includes invisible gloves fix for robes.
State.Name: Revealing Robes

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: An immersive vanilla plus balance mod. Rare loot is actually rare, high level enemies only spawn at boss-level spawn points, low level enemies and items can spawn regardless of level, and a ton of other minor balance tweaks. Oblivion, as it was meant to be!
State.Name: Ascension Remastered - Vanilla-Plus Loot and Balance

Original.Name: Core Survival Simple Hunting Overhaul Patch-3037-1-0-1754212129.7z

State.Author: rockmik
State.Description:
Core Survival brings a balanced, immersive survival mode to Oblivion, as if it were part of the vanilla game

(with COOKING and FISHING included).
State.Name: Core Survival (Needs - Cooking - Fishing)

State.Author: molerats - Operative85
State.Description:
Patches Knights of the White Stallion Armor﻿'s .gnd model to work with patch 1.2 of Oblivion Remastered. 



Patch 1.2 has broken modified/custom static meshes that were made prior to the update; it requires manually fixing them in Blender and Unreal Engine.
State.Name: Knights of the White Stallion Armor - 1.2 Patch

State.Author: Stoofy Frond
State.Description:
This mod adds simple, but immersive mining mechanics to Oblivion Remastered:

1. You must have a pickaxe in your inventory to loot an ore node.

2. Ore nodes respawn on instance reset.

3. Ore prices have been rebalanced to make silver and gold more valuable.

4. Allows you to permanently "learn" the transmute minerals spell.
State.Name: Mini Mining Mod

Original.Name: Quest NPCs Run-No Tutorial or Forlorn Watchman Run-219-1-7-3-1748175559.7z

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: Makes slow walking quest NPCs run.
State.Name: Quest NPCs Run

State.Author: LameJames
State.Description: Makes bosses and other unique enemies more difficult
State.Name: Stronger Bosses

State.Author: Kaboff
State.Description: This mod improves NPC dialogues by keeping conversations in real-time (no pause), removing the dialogue lighting effect, and reducing the dialogue field of view (FOV).
State.Name: Better Dialogue (UE4SS)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Tweaks map menu, to make it more readable without losing information.
State.Name: Better Map Menu

State.Author: Dayng
State.Description: Reduces the movement speed penalty of slope climbing. Set a custom value in the mod config to set the desired penalty.
State.Name: Faster Mountain Slope Climbing

State.Author: GodschildGaming
State.Description: Dynamically loads new esp item form ids into the TesSyncmap for mesh assignment
State.Name: UE4SS TesSyncMapInjector

State.Author: AlexPreit Unseelium
State.Description: Umbra replacer updated for patch 1.2
State.Name: Unseelium's Umbra updated (4K)

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Makes fatigue affect weapon damage just like it did in the original game.
State.Name: Fatigue Affects Damage

State.Author: molerats
State.Description: Gives more appropriate armor to many Fighters Guild members that better match their rank and class
State.Name: Fighters Guild Refitted

State.Author: Skullzy
State.Description: Adds Lanterns to roads all over Cyrodiil. Didn't go crazy and placed them like they are suppose to be there :)
State.Name: Lanterns of Cyrodiil

State.Author: ColdTyrant
State.Description: Join the Mythic Dawn Cult (for real!) during the "Dagon Shrine" Main Quest, and bring an end to the Septim Dynasty.
State.Name: Mythic Dawn Rising

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: Completed quests now raise the quest giver's disposition towards you. For example, the Count of Cheydinhal will actually like you a lot more for closing the Cheydinhal oblivion gate and saving his son, and he should therefore allow you to buy a house in his city.
State.Name: Quests Change NPC's Disposition

State.Author: Strategy Master
State.Description: This mod revamps Oblivion's magic system to be more balanced, varied and enjoyable by fixing bugs, enhancing spellcasting, and staying true to the game's original balance and lore.
State.Name: Supreme Magicka

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Simple rebalance of Vampire skills and abilities.
State.Name: Vamped Up Vampires

State.Author: rockmik
State.Description:
Core Survival brings a balanced, immersive survival mode to Oblivion, as if it were part of the vanilla game

(with COOKING and FISHING included).
State.Name: Core Survival (Needs - Cooking - Fishing)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Cleans up the dialogue menu for a sleeker look.
State.Name: Better Dialogue Menu

State.Author: firesyrup
State.Description: A third-person camera overhaul inspired by God of War and Resident Evil 4, shifting the character up and further left for better visibility.
State.Name: Improved Camera (Resident Evil 4 - God of War Style)

State.Author: Wild Haggis
State.Description: Adds Hellish sounds (screams and stuff) to the open portal sound effects.
State.Name: Portals to Hell

Original.Name: Auto Upgrade Leveled Items - On Level Up-567-1-1-3-1747273472.rar

State.Author: TheOneTrueRy
State.Description: Automatically replaces leveled unique items obtained as quest rewards with a version fitting for your level as your character progresses. No more worrying about what level you should or shouldn't complete certain quests at!
State.Name: Auto Upgrade Leveled Items

State.Author: Enodoc - Gerald
State.Description: Decorative gates alongside the main roads mark the boundaries of the Counties of Cyrodiil.
State.Name: County Gates

State.Author: TheFoxOfKvatch
State.Description:
Compatibility Patches for Ascension 1.0.9, BNPC 1.0.2, DLC Integration 1.1, and UORP 1.0.6.

5/16/2025: Now supporting Balanced NPC Level Caps
State.Name: Fox's Ascension Compatibility Patch Hub

Original.Name: Necromancy is Actually Banned - Main File-1188-2-1-1746826997.7z

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Necromancy has been banned by the Mages Guild yet nobody cares if you use undead summons. This fixes that.
State.Name: Necromancy is Actually Banned

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Overhauls all playable races with new passives and powers, and allows you to augment your racial abilities by visiting a rune stone rather than just getting temporary bound equipment.
State.Name: Race Based Runestones

Original.Name: Vile Lair DLC - Tweaks and Fixes-1748-1-2-1a-1746131434.7z

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: Tweaks and fixes for the Vile Lair official DLC.
State.Name: Vile Lair DLC - Tweaks and Fixes

State.Author: perchik71
State.Description: Mod for Oblivion Remastered. Various improvements and optimizations.
State.Name: Turpentine

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Cleans up the dialogue menu for a sleeker look.
State.Name: Better Dialogue Menu

State.Author: Dicene
State.Description: UE4SS dll that enables Lua mods to read results directly from console commands and fire them without the risk of crashing that accompanies the existing ConsoleCommand utility frameworks.
State.Name: ConsoleUtils - UE4SS

State.Author: molerats - Operative85
State.Description:
Patches Knights of the White Stallion Armor﻿'s .gnd model to work with patch 1.2 of Oblivion Remastered. 



Patch 1.2 has broken modified/custom static meshes that were made prior to the update; it requires manually fixing them in Blender and Unreal Engine.
State.Name: Knights of the White Stallion Armor - 1.2 Patch

Original.Name: Protective Headgear - Iron - For Game Version 1.2-2935-1-5-1760134282.7z

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: Remodel for the iron helmet.
State.Name: Protective Headgear - Iron - Closed Iron Helmet

State.Author: grassfinch
State.Description: As the name suggests, Roadside Grass to Little Weeds replaces the default roadside grass with small, creeping weeds.
State.Name: Roadside Grass to Little Weeds

State.Author: Ian Patterson
State.Description: The Oblivion Remastered Script Extender, or OBSE64 for short, is a modder's resource that expands the modding capabilities of Oblivion Remastered.
State.Name: Oblivion Remastered Script Extender (OBSE64)

State.Author: Guinefort
State.Description: Adds enchanting and spellmaking altars to many locations across the game that make sense. In mages guildhalls, magic shops, and some dungeons. You are no longer forced into joining the Arcane University to unlock these features.
State.Name: Available Altars - Enchanting and Spellmaking

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Adds 1 point of infamy to the player anytime they cast a daedra summoning spell in the vicinity of an npc who is not in an evil faction.
State.Name: Daedra Are Actually Bad

State.Author: dreamed1
State.Description: Adds skill requirements to advancement in the Mages and Fighters Guild. A novice spellcaster can no longer become arch-mage of Cyrodiil, nor can a Master of the Fighters Guild have no prowess in combat skills.
State.Name: Guild Advancement - Remastered and Streamlined

State.Author: IxionXVII
State.Description: Increases the damage done by Lava.
State.Name: Lethal Lava

Original.Name: Addon - Summoning Undead Results in Bounty-1188-2-1-1746827126.7z

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Necromancy has been banned by the Mages Guild yet nobody cares if you use undead summons. This fixes that.
State.Name: Necromancy is Actually Banned

State.Author: chrisgreely1999
State.Description: Expands on the Oldblivion mod, changing hundreds of lines of dialogue to sound like actual conversations.
State.Name: Realistic Player Dialogue Overhaul - Remastered and Expanded

State.Author: Test001
State.Description: Add some comfort and coziness to a humble shoreline cabin! Overhaul of the Waterfront Shack in Imperial City. Almost completely remodeled the interior, added lots of storage, a couple of display cases, altars for enchantments, lots of extra decor, and some secrets.
State.Name: Waterfront Shack interior renovation

State.Author: Meridiano
State.Description: Removes the [NL] tag from items added or changed with ESP plugins we all know and love.
State.Name: NL-Tag Remover

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Yeets darkening of unfocused panel in trade menu.
State.Name: Better Trade Menu

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod makes various gates and bridges penetrable so that you can attack enemies across using whatever means.
State.Name: Glorious Holes of Oblivion (GHO)

State.Author: Uregven
State.Description: Makes the compass less overbearing.
State.Name: Minimalistic Compass

State.Author: ultramatt
State.Description: Ultra Combat is a UE4SS based total overhaul for Oblivion Remastered combat built to provide a stable, engaging, and immersive combat experience with depth that is missing in vanilla for all physical character archetypes.
State.Name: Ultra Combat UE4SS V2 - Physical Combat Overhaul

State.Author: peonytea
State.Description: A simple retexture for the Ayleid ruins making their appearance more in line with the original game. Optional upscaled 2k/4k/8k variants for higher graphical fidelity.
State.Name: White Ayleid Ruins

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Overhauls the bonuses granted from interacting with an Ayleid Well from a temporary buff to a stacking and permanent increase to maximum magicka, with a special bonus for interacting with every Ayleid Well in the vanilla game. Collect them all!
State.Name: Ayleid Mana Wells

State.Author: WMDBloodHunter
State.Description: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered) is a complete overhaul of the Dark Brotherhood locations to give them a fresh new take.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered)

State.Author: LameJames
State.Description: Be a true thief and sell some stolen goods
State.Name: Higher Thieves' Guild Fence Amounts

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Allows low-leveled creatures and items to continue spawning regardless of player level, rather than disappearing from the world as you level up.
State.Name: Leveled Creature and Item Diversity

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Necromancy has been banned by the Mages Guild yet nobody cares if you use undead summons. This fixes that.
State.Name: Necromancy is Actually Banned

State.Author: Publick Gamer
State.Description: Ever tried to immerse yourself in conversations between your character and an npc, only to find your character supposedly walks up to people saying 'Rumors' and expecting an answer. Well worry no more, as this mod currently makes around 250 changes to well over 400 npcs, improving the overall player dialogue experience.
State.Name: Realistic Player Dialogue Overhaul

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: this mod adds the god statue to the correspondent shrine, also offerings related to the deity and some food and ingredients for the wandering pilgrim. for more immersion
State.Name: Wayshrines - Quaint addon

State.Author: nigeez
State.Description: Improves low quality grass texture to match the quality of other textures
State.Name: Improved Mossy Grass Texture

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Buy a garden for your house.
State.Name: Backyard Gardens for Player Homes - For Alchemists and Botanists

State.Author: WMDBloodHunter
State.Description: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered) is a complete overhaul of the Dark Brotherhood locations to give them a fresh new take.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered)

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Makes outlaws look more villainous by adding a chance for Bandits, Highwaymen, Marauders, and Vampires to be wearing various hoods. Optionally covers Conjurers and Necromancers.
State.Name: Hooded Outlaws

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Allows low-leveled creatures and items to continue spawning regardless of player level, rather than disappearing from the world as you level up.
State.Name: Leveled Creature and Item Diversity

State.Author: MadAborModding
State.Description: Necromancy has been banned by the Mages Guild yet nobody cares if you use undead summons. This fixes that.
State.Name: Necromancy is Actually Banned

Original.Name: Rebalanced and Unleveled Quest Gold Rewards-1460-2-2-1746762601.7z

State.Author: zzyma
State.Description: This mod rebalances and unlevels gold rewards for quests to make them less underwhelming and better fitting of the quest's circumstances.
State.Name: Rebalanced and Unleveled Quest Gold Rewards

State.Author: OzenRSI
State.Description: This small mod allows you to wear gloves, boots, and greaves with robes.
State.Name: Wear Robes With Boots Gloves Greaves

State.Author: powerofthree
State.Description: OBSE64 plugin that prevents teleporting back to jail when paying off fines.
State.Name: No Crime Teleport OBSE

State.Author: C0N0R
State.Description: Battlehorn Castle Expanded enhances and redecorates the iconic stronghold, adding new storage options, visual improvements, and an evolving Daedric Shrine Tracker that responds to quest progress. Includes secret room upgrades, rebalanced clutter, and better display organization for a more immersive home.
State.Name: Battlehorn Castle Expanded

State.Author: WMDBloodHunter
State.Description: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered) is a complete overhaul of the Dark Brotherhood locations to give them a fresh new take.
State.Name: Dark Brotherhood (Remastered)

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds a spell that summons your horse from a distance or makes it follow you.
State.Name: Horse Whistle - Summon and Follow

State.Author: TheMrNewVegas
State.Description: Locks the doors to the DLC Homes, making it necessary for the player to complete certain steps before becoming the owner of these estates. Now with lore integration!
State.Name: Locked DLC Homes - Guild Based Requirements

State.Author: Sasquatch
State.Description: Replaces over 400 of the annoying messageboxes that appear when interacting with certain objects with a message in the top left corner instead.
State.Name: No Annoying Messageboxes

State.Author: Drommerenn
State.Description: Relocates Shady Sam down to the Waterfront, where he will still hide in a wall crevice, but also roam the graveyard of a morning, then spend the evenings in the slums!
State.Name: Relocated - Shady Sam

State.Author: IRAPPIDZ
State.Description: Replaces the vanilla bow audio with lighter, more impactful sounds.
State.Name: Bow Sound Redesigned

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod makes the female power attack and hit voices of all elven races younger and more feminine.
State.Name: Younger Elven Female Voice
